channel.title: [Feather] RuneScape Remake
channel.description:
[CENTER] [img]http://i.imgur.com/e76ysbd.png[/img] [SPOILER=Development Team] - [B]Gircat[/B] - [B]Citellum[/B] [/SPOILER]
[IMG]http://www.cds.ca/cdsclearinghome.nsf/arrow_icon.gif[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.google.com/forums/member.php?88-Gircat"][B]Visit our site. (Coming Soon)[/B][/URL]
[B]Basic Information[/B] - Original Matrix release. - June 2012 based Remake - Full economy
[B]Why Feather?[/B] Feather will be one of the most active 2012 RuneScape remakes. Our goal is to make one of the most advanced remakes but above all the others we see out there. We will work our best to make this happen, and we look forward to sharing our content and experience with you all. Jordan and I would like to thank our future supporters in advance.
[B]Other News.[/B] Our last project, [URL=http://"http://www.google.com/forums/showthread.php?93053-Feather-RS2011-Remake"]Rs2011 Remake[/URL], was discontinued after having a fairly long conversation with Jordan. This project will be ongoing, there will be a 2012 remake provided to all of you.
[B]Supporting us.[/B] If you would like to support us, donations are being accepted towards me for now. These donations will be saved up, and going completely towards Feather. Nothing other than that.
[B]Can I join the team?[/B] As for a server developer, the answer will always be [B]no[/B]. Jordan and I have came to an agreement that there will not be any other developers. - We will be hiring a webdeveloper and a few graphic artists later on in this project. I will post applications for that in a while from now.
Developers Log: [CODE] - Removing useless NPC's. - Began tutorial. - Finished the Lumbridge Cook for this one. More advanced than the last. - Unlocked Quest Tab. - Added Item Removing from Equipment Tab. - Added full player design. - Task System Configs. - Quest Tab Configs. - Finished player design. - Added Lobby. - Fixed Password & Username Bugs. - Changed the way accounts are saved. [/CODE]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v8olJwblcZg
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Oqb1HJDh12I
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CD1y77u-tGs
[SPOILER=Media / Content] [img]http://i.imgur.com/V3graSk.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SDZdJGZ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/h5cISZR.png[/img] [img]http://img542.imageshack.us/img542/6273/uod6.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SCxulwc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2JukxIM.png[/img] [img]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/9769/4u1q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SH1OlQv.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/aKNlSXO.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/AGolU1U.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Support image] N/A [/SPOILER]
[SIZE=1]RuneScape is copyright © Jagex Ltd 1999-2013. RuneScape and Jagex are registered trademarks of Jagex Ltd. Feather is not affiliated with Jagex Ltd in any way and exists solely for educational purposes.[/SIZE][/CENTER]
If you would like to show some support, please [B][U]thank[/U][/B] this thread.

item.title: [Feather] RuneScape Remake
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Can you remove the parts where you copied from R-S to post here. There’s some big differences between the sites, at times.
Other than that, good job so far and good luck on the development. I’ll be looking at your progress. Remakes are always cool to watch

Read full topic

item.title: [Feather] RuneScape Remake
item.dc:creator: @Citellum Citellum
item.description:
@Citellum wrote:

[CENTER]

[SPOILER=Development Team]

  • Gircat
  • Citellum
    [/SPOILER]

Visit our site. (Coming Soon)

Basic Information

  • Original Matrix release.
  • June 2012 based Remake
  • Full economy

Why Feather?
Feather will be one of the most active 2012 RuneScape remakes. Our goal is to make one of the most advanced remakes but above all the others we see out there. We will work our best to make this happen, and we look forward to sharing our content and experience with you all. Jordan and I would like to thank our future supporters in advance.

Other News.
Our last project, Rs2011 Remake, was discontinued after having a fairly long conversation with Jordan. This project will be ongoing, there will be a 2012 remake provided to all of you.

Supporting us.
If you would like to support us, donations are being accepted towards me for now. These donations will be saved up, and going completely towards Feather. Nothing other than that.

Can I join the team?
As for a server developer, the answer will always be no. Jordan and I have came to an agreement that there will not be any other developers. - We will be hiring a webdeveloper and a few graphic artists later on in this project. I will post applications for that in a while from now.

Developers Log:

- Removing useless NPC's.
- Began tutorial.
- Finished the Lumbridge Cook for this one. More advanced than the last.
- Unlocked Quest Tab.
- Added Item Removing from Equipment Tab.
- Added full player design.
- Task System Configs.
- Quest Tab Configs.
- Finished player design.
- Added Lobby.
- Fixed Password & Username Bugs.
- Changed the way accounts are saved.
